replies.body: Well I think it was made roughly 3 years ago when it wasn't called Avicus I used to play it when I was 10 . And my favourite old hub was the hub in the sky with the nether portals I would love to have another hub like that one !

replies.body: November 2nd 2013.
replies.body_tagged: November 2nd 2013.

replies.body: McZone was made roughly three years ago, then evolved to Avicus on November 2nd, 2013. Before McZone, Ivy had a survival server (I think?) called Terrascape.
replies.body_tagged: McZone was made roughly three years ago, then evolved to Avicus on November 2nd, 2013. Before McZone, Ivy had a survival server (I think?) called Terrascape.

replies.body: The server dates back much further than McZone, back when Parapenguin developed the plugin solo.
replies.body_tagged: The server dates back much further than McZone, back when Parapenguin developed the plugin solo.

replies.body: About 2 years ago
